name: MHTOCSMMTemporaryTracheostomy
title: MH TOC SMM ValueSet for Temporary Tracheostomy Indicator
description: ICD-10-PCS and ICD-9-CM codes for the Severe Maternal Morbidity indicator: Temporary Tracheostomy. This value set includes procedure codes representing temporary tracheostomy procedures.
